issue.title: [JAVA] Implement getField() method for the complex readers
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1191](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1191). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The getField() method is no implemented for UnionReader, NullableMapReaderImpl, SingleMapReaderImpl, and UnionListReader.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1191?focusedCommentId=16090041) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Issue resolved by pull request 818
